meanings.definition: Pertaining to the male reproductive organs of a flower.
meanings.sent1: The staminal parts of the blossom were essential for pollination.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully examined the staminal components of the orchids.
meanings.sent3: The staminal elements of the flower blushed when bees approached.
meanings.sent4: The staminal essence of the bloom attracted various insects.
meanings.sent5: The staminal structures of the plant were crucial for its reproduction.
